text: In today’s edition of #WWSST (What would @steveschale tweet): What? @MedcalfByESPN says @FSUHoops is 17th best team left In the tourney? We’re ranked 10th in the country! #wtf #NoRespect
author: bsfarrington

text: Well, we're all dying, but no the hiccups aren't killing you. I once had them three days straight in London. That was 32 years ago. So using math, if they end after one day, you probably have another 90 or so years to live.
author: bsfarrington

text: Watching Kentucky v Wofford and hoping @Miamicurt can type without fingernails.
author: bsfarrington

text: Apple doesn’t fall far?
author: bsfarrington

text: Now, if the Mueller report was in a white Bronco speeding south to Tijuana, we’d all be ignoring @marchmadness
author: bsfarrington

text: Mueller report: Boil for 10 to 12 minutes, depending on how soft you like your pasta
author: bsfarrington

text: Sooo crazy! I’m sitting The Deck Pizza Pub and nobody’s talking about the Mueller report.
author: bsfarrington

text: Or perhaps a puffer fish realizing it just  swallowed a Bud Light.
author: bsfarrington

text: Whoa! Bud Light has been around for 37 years and I'm just finding out now that it isn't brewed with corn syrup? Well, I'll be darned. I guess I'll start drinking it now.
author: bsfarrington

text: Overheard in Senate Office Building: If someone asks "Whose bill is that?" you have an 8 in 10 chance of being right if you say @JoeGruters
author: bsfarrington

text: Ouch! He's here all week folks, two shows on Friday.
author: bsfarrington

text: Through the Senate. Still needs House passage.
author: bsfarrington

text: Yes
author: bsfarrington

text: Home grown: Florida Senate passes vegetable garden bill (from @AP)
author: bsfarrington

text: SB 82
author: bsfarrington

text: All 5 no votes against the @Rob_Bradley front-yard vegetable garden bill were cast by Democrats.
author: bsfarrington

text: Irony? Sen. @FarmerForFLSen votes against growing vegetables in front yards.
author: bsfarrington

text: Sen. Powell is speaking against @Rob_Bradley bill that would keep government's hands off of front yard vegetable gardens. When did the Democrats become anti-vegetable?
author: bsfarrington

text: Are you driving? If so, I call shotgun AND pick the tunes.
author: bsfarrington

text: Ha! Was just about to tweet at you too.
author: bsfarrington

text: Can you send me a YouTube link on how to fly it?
author: bsfarrington

text: Can your plane get me within 200 miles of Hartford on Thursday for under $500?
author: bsfarrington

text: Be sure to stop at Dos Gatos for an orange jalapeño margarita, have a steak at @cowfordjax, a beer @IntuitionAle, buy me a bottle of gin @ManifestSpirits and cover for me workwise while I'm in Hartford.
author: bsfarrington

text: OK, if I ever leave journalism, I want to be the guy who plans promotions for the @JaxShrimp. Miami Vice night? Ramen noodle appreciation night? $2 bill giveaway day? Scampi bobblehead? Dang.
author: bsfarrington

text: Do you think we can cover the Legislature from there for two days? Wait. Stupid question.  Of course we could.
author: bsfarrington

text: Flights from Tallahassee to Hartford to see @FSUHoops are running around $1,000 RT. Even if I stay with my parents, that's a little too much for my budget, and I'm not the crowdfunding type. Sigh.
author: bsfarrington

text: Good goal.
author: bsfarrington

text: So you were the yellow guy wearing square pants! Wish you had said hello. Huge fan.
author: bsfarrington

text: Still can’t believe ⁦@COTNews⁩ hasn’t done anything about this blight on one of Tallahassee’s most vibrant neighborhoods. Midtown deserves better.
author: bsfarrington

text: I grew up in Boston and celebrated getting old in St. John’s. I can verify this is true. https://twitter.com/newfiescumbag/status/1107357537303703559 …
author: bsfarrington

text: Happy birthday @torquilcampbell I’ll fill the CD player with @youarestars and @memphispopband in your honour.
author: bsfarrington

text: So @AmyRenee610 and I were at our favourite restaurant talking with our favourite waitress when I said, “Amy! Listen!” Amy said, “It’s @ErikaWennerstr1!” We then babbled about Erika’s amazing voice and meeting her at the first concert we went to together. We left a real good tip.
author: bsfarrington

text: It’s true. 2019 session is the best ever. Loving every minute.
author: bsfarrington

text: This is really why ⁦@steveschale⁩ isn’t tweeting
author: bsfarrington

text: Is that all you have Duke? You know we have a deeper bench, right? If you haven’t killed us yet, then be afraid. Very afraid. #WWSST  @fsuhoops
author: bsfarrington

text: Sorry, yes. I suffer with you.
author: bsfarrington

text: Now that I’ve come out of my coma, need to get a defibrillator. @FSUHoops @DukeMBB
author: bsfarrington

text: I will say, sir, I have been asleep when your meetings began, but jolted awake like I sat on a cattle prod once roll was called.
author: bsfarrington

text: The pre-Lent @steveschale would have RTed this
author: bsfarrington

text: I only use my powers for good, not evil.
author: bsfarrington

text: He's also telling folks that Gov. Gillum is doing a helluva job in Alabama.
author: bsfarrington

text: If they were serious about World Sleep Day, they would have scheduled it for Tuesday at the 8 a.m. House Health Quality Subcommittee meeting in 212 Knott.
author: bsfarrington

text: It's World Sleep Day? Really? What's tomorrow? World Take a Crap Day? Is Monday World Breathe Oxygen Day? I'm looking forward to Tuesday. I hear that's World Drink Water Day.
author: bsfarrington

text: I’m too antsy. Wish I could be placed into a medically induced coma until @fsuhoops tipoff.
author: bsfarrington

text: If @steveschale were tweeting right now, he’d be saying something like @FSUHoops never having lost to Duke in an ACC championship game when he and I have worn @jaguars jerseys while drinking #Florida craft beer.
author: bsfarrington

text: I've been drinking water and walking for most of my life. A couple of years or so in the '60s are blurry.
author: bsfarrington

text: My kid emailed my a youtube link to a song. Definitely not something of my generation, but the autoplay next played @bettieserveert. I love Bettie Serveert. I say I love a lot of bands. But the Betties are truly among my favorite. So this is for you:
author: bsfarrington

text: Mike, writing about government and politics, you wouldn't believe the crap I get dragged into. Thank whoever you pray to that all you got dragged into was a talk about hoops and bars.
author: bsfarrington

text: I honestly thought Virginia was the best team in the country. Not saying this means @FSUHoops are gonna win it all, but I am saying it’s possible.
author: bsfarrington

text: I want UNC. Bring ‘em on.
author: bsfarrington

text: Mike needs to relax a little. Let's drag him to the Leon Pub and make him play pool, breathe nicotine and listen to old 80s music on the jukebox to show him where beer snobbery really began.
author: bsfarrington

text: How about this? If they hit 30 wins, we get a keg of @ProofBrewingCo and do live social media of the celebration.
author: bsfarrington

text: And @steveschale just texted me his reaction to the @FSUHoops win. (parental discretion advised)
author: bsfarrington

text: Greg will be updating this in the coming days to say. "First time @FSUHoops has won 28 games." Then "First time @FSUHoops has won 29 games." If I'm wrong, I'll buy Greg and the person of his choice a beer.
author: bsfarrington

text: I have absolutely no authorization to do this, nor is it based on any communication I've had, but I'm going to tweet for @steveschale: Suck it ESPN, @FSUHoops are for real. Please remember that tomorrow. #WWSST
author: bsfarrington

text: And maybe more, depending on tomorrow.
author: bsfarrington

text: Anyone have a couch I can sleep on in Charlotte, NC, tomorrow?
author: bsfarrington

text: Early, I know, but love seeing @FSUHoops up 10 over Virginia. #WWSST
author: bsfarrington

text: Brandon. Ever since I've moved south of the Mason-Dixon line, I get Brandon a lot. When I was at Boston University, I dated a Florida woman who insisted on calling me Brandon even though she knew it was wrong. That relationship didn't last long.
author: bsfarrington

text: If @KamalaHarris insists on emailing me looking for money, I wish she'd at least spell my name right.
author: bsfarrington

text: And I’ve been kicked out of worse.
author: bsfarrington

text: Either that or he’d correct the correct answers.
author: bsfarrington

text: Is it true @fineout was banned from trivia night at the Old Capitol?
author: bsfarrington

text: Once again sitting in a committee that started before 9 a.m. In my best @justice2jesus voice, "If they're meeting early, there must be something squirrelly."
author: bsfarrington

text: I'm a @RedSox fan till I die, and hopefully beyond, but I love New Yorkers.
author: bsfarrington

text: This is worth tweeting every legislative session:
author: bsfarrington

text: Brian Pitts on the Constitution Revision Commission: "Sorry, no offense to the business people that were on that committee, but they didn't have a clue as to what they were doing."
author: bsfarrington

text: What members are going to have @fsuhoops on in their office? Asking for @steveschale #WWSST
author: bsfarrington

text: What happens if Lent ends and @steveschale says, "&#*@ Twitter. I'm done."? #WWSST
author: bsfarrington

text: I wish I could take @justice2jesus with me when I buy my next new car.
author: bsfarrington

text: "What is this like? In your face because we can? ...What's the need? What's the problem you're solving" _ Brian Pitts.
author: bsfarrington

text: Inspired by @GovGoneWild opening an 8:30 a.m. committee meeting with a joke about his hair, I'm sharing this with you ...
author: bsfarrington

text: More from @justice2jesus "This is supposed to be government in sunshine and all that kind of stuff. Everything's supposed to be available, right? No it's not."
author: bsfarrington

text: More from @justice2jesus "You don't have to repeal it. You're going to do what you want anyway." I don't even know what the bill is, but I'm fired up.
author: bsfarrington

text:
Brian Pitts on the proposed House message to Congress on Venezuela "You can get them for crimes against humanity ... Do we have crimes against humanity? We do. Let's do something about it right now ...
If you're serious, get to it. If not, leave it alone." @justice2jesus
author: bsfarrington

text: Nothing like @justice2jesus to wake you up in an early committee.
author: bsfarrington

text: That’s definitely a #WWSST
author: bsfarrington

text: With @steveschale off Twitter for Lent, I might set up a fake account to tweet what he would on subjects like @FSUHoops, Blake Bortles, beer and people sitting in committee meetings caught on @floridachannel cameras. #WWSST (What Would Steve Schale Tweet?)
author: bsfarrington
